radiographic_examinations.findings: Grade 1 Fetal Growth Restriction (FGR) diagnosed; normal fetal anatomy without structural defects observed in any of the ultrasounds.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Fetal weight gain was slow starting from the 20th week of gestation; diagnosed with Grade 1 FGR at the 30th week; weekly assessments of the cerebroplacental index and amniotic fluid volume were conducted.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal fetal well-being before labor pre-induction.
